title: Exploring adsorption dynamics of heavy metals onto varied commercial microplastic substrates: Isothermal models and kinetics analysis
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Anda-Gabriela Tenea, Cristina Dinu, Paul Alexandru Rus, Ioana Alexandra Ionescu, Stefania Gheorghe, Vasile Ion Iancu, Gabriela Geanina Vasile, Luoana Florentina Pascu, Florentina Laura Chiriac
